title: Do skin suggestions even matter?
body:
I was just curious, are there are any examples of peoples skin/champion suggestions being taken seriously enough to be put into the game? 
or is it just for fun to share ideas?

replies.body:
We take a lot of player ideas into consideration! We keep a folder full of cool ideas we see, so when we go to ideate on a new skin for x champion, we have a collection of player creations to look into! 

Sometimes, they do make it into the game! For example, AstoNaut. :3
Could we get some examples of ones that are in the folder but haven't made it ingame? :)

Well, I just added Molten Zac the other day, a lot of the PROJECT concepts are in there, the Halloween Miss Fortune, and Sea Witch Nami to name a few. 

Again, no guarantees they'll make it in game, but we do discuss them when we're coming up with a new skin for x champion.
